name: Red House Painters
description: '''Red House Painters''' were an American [[rock music|rock]] band formed in 1989. Ohio-born vocalist Mark Kozelek met drummer Anthony Koutsos in [[Atlanta]], Georgia. Together, they moved to [[San Francisco]], California  where they joined bassist Jerry Vessel and guitarist Gorden Mack to form Red House Painters. Phil Carney would later replace Gorden Mack as the band's guitarist. The group released 6 studio albums and an EP, before dissolving in 2001, and are considered to be a pioneering act of the [[slowcore]] subgenre.
